doc:
Robert Lynen https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Robert_Lynen 0 Robert Lynen (24 May 1920 – 1 April 1944) was a French actor. A child star of French cinema, he joined the French Resistance during his country's occupation during World War II, was arrested and deported to Germany before been shot by a firing squad after repeated escape attempts. Robert_Lynen ( 24_May_1920 – 1_April_1944 ) was a_French_actor . A_child_star of French_cinema , he joined the_French_Resistance during his_country 's_occupation during World_War_II , was_arrested and deported to Germany before been shot by a_firing_squad after repeated_escape_attempts .
